This data is used to enhance and report on the personalised advertising experience on partner sites.\",\"learnMore\":{\"privacyPolicyLinkData\":{\"uri\":\"https://agreementservice.svs.nike.com/rest/agreement?agreementType=privacyPolicy&uxId=com.nike.commerce.nikedotcom.web&country=RO&language=en&requestType=redirect\",\"name\":\"Privacy Policy\"},\"body\":\"We use cookies and similar technologies for advertising purposes and would like to share your browsing data with ad networks to help Nike better personalise ads outside the Nike ecosystem.\\n\\nIf you dont allow this, ads won't be based on your Nike browsing data and may not be as relevant to you.\\n\\nYou control your data. For example, in the EU, our partners include: Facebook, Instagram, Google and Snapchat.\\n\\nFor more information, please see our Privacy Policy.\\n\\n{privacy_policy_link_data}\"},\"consentDialogue\":\"Share your email address and phone number with Nike ad partners, so we can personalise ads based on your interests.\",\"description\":\"Permission for ad targeting based on profile matching in WEB Settings\",\"consentSelectionControl\":{\"checkbox\":{\"label\":\"Profile-based advertising\"}},\"consentSubHeader\":\"Profile-based advertising\",\"level\":2}]},{\"metadata\":{\"contextFrameId\":\"72d5cf4e-6463-4d0c-a103-9d45ff43900c\",\"contextFrameName\":\"web_guest_modal\",\"alwaysOnDisclosure\":{\"disabledControlMapping\":{\"3\":\"checkbox\",\"4\":\"none\",\"5\":\"checkbox\"},\"disabledControl\":{\"none\":{\"label\":\"Strictly necessary (always on)\"},\"checkbox\":{\"label\":\"Strictly necessary (always on)\"}},\"dialogue\":\"Enables core site functionality to remember your language, location and shopping bag history.
